name: MOONSH🌖T
description:
MOONSHOT is a word making space race. Your aim is to make enough 8 letter words from pairs of 4 letter words to make it to the moon 🌕

You’ll start with a 4 letter word and 6 starry letters 💫 These stars contain a possible 4 letter combination that, when added to your starting word, will make an 8 letter link in your chain.
